attributes.action: Ban Battery Chicken Farming in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Chickens are intelligent clever animals and should be treated to an outside life even if its only for a short while, why aren't the government doing anything?

They are more interested on easy targets such as MOTORISTS, and we just sit back and let them, people need to lobby together and make the government understand the publics feelings about this practice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
